item.title: Maxwell’s, Hoboken’s Legendary Rock Venue That Helped Spawn Nirvana, the Replacements and More, Is Getting a Documentary — Submissions Welcome
item.description: If there was a mecca of indie rock, it wasn’t Manhattan’s CBGB or Minneapolis’ First Avenue or Chapel Hill’s Cat’s Cradle or Al’s Bar in L.A. It was Maxwell’s in Hoboken, New Jersey, just across the r
